name: dryingTime_setValue
description: This function is used to set the operating time of the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the drying time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the drying time.

parameters.name: dryingTimer
parameters.description: The amount of time in minutes to set the drying timer.
